title: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao Quits and Pleads Guilty to Breaking US Law
description: Changpeng Zhao, also known as CZ, will step down and plead guilty to violating money laundering requirements as part of a DOJ settlement. The company will also pay $4.3bn in fines.

title: New Orleans Tried to Control Short-Term Rentals With a Lottery System. It Was a Mess
description: In trying to limit the impact of short-term rentals like Airbnbs, New Orleans used an elaborate lottery system to pit neighbors against each other. A lawsuit from angry hosts has put it in limbo.
